package.name: Buric_Apc
package.summary: Clear the APC cache from Cache management section in Magento admin panel.
package.description:
This extension adds the "Flush APC Cache" button in the Cache management section in Magento admin. When user clicks on the button, whole APC cache is cleared (user cache + opcode cache). User is warned if there is no APC installed at the server. From version 2.0.0.0 there is no admin theme modifications (observer method injects HTML).
GitHub Repository
package.notes: No admin theme modifications (observer method injects HTML).
